thread.title: Good deal
thread.title_full: Good deal - Review of The Waldorf Hilton London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Amanda032
title: Good deal
text: Family of 4 with older teens we visited this as part of a groupon deal - 3 courses with a glass of champagne Â£100 for 4. Service was excellent - unobtrusive and efficient and good was delicious - especially the starter of mackerel tartare. Alcohol was pricey but to be expected I guess and it was a nice treat for us all.
